item.description:
Come join us for a Boy vs. Girl social discussion where we'll banter over a variety of fun and stimulating topics!

This event is being hosted by Boston Most Eligible Singles at The Liberty Hotel, and will be moderated by our good friend Mo.

Of course - there will be drinks and apps...

What's better than trading wits with a cocktail in hand? The more drinks, the better (and wilder) the discussion!!

Girls? Check.
Boys? Check.
Drinks? Check.
Food to go along with those drinks? Check.
Stimulating topics to banter over? Check.
Sexy Lounge atmosphere? Check.

For those that can’t make it , we’ll have a table/VIP area reserved in the lobby area (the open space once you go up the escalators) of the hotel by the bar. Hope to see you guys …ahem…gals there!

 

PS: You can reach me by text or phone at: 4015732857.
item.name: He said, She said...
